data.title: The Bronze Star Medal · Dr. Hector P. Garcia Digital Exhibit · Bell Library Exhibits
data.text:
Title

The Bronze Star Medal

Description

For his admirable service during World War II, Dr. Garcia received the Bronze Star Medal. The citation for the medal recognized his “outstanding diligence and loyalty to duty.”

Date

July 23, 1954

Type

Text

Identifier

HPG185.jpg

Is Part Of

Dr. Hector P. Garcia Papers, Collection 5, Box 13, Folder 31. Special Collections and Archives, Mary and Jeff Bell Library, Texas A&M University-Corpus Christi
